English: En route to Le Moule.""
Third day of fighting, Morton.""
What's up, Ivan? Bored of fighting, are you?
I'm pissed more than bored. I feel like shit. It was a disaster!
What do you mean?
Provins, what else? We seized it, barely. And then had to retreat to Figari. Which we lost right after.\nWhat was the point of all that?

The point as comrade lieutenant said was to get access to the capital, Montignac.\nNot every battle will be a victory and most of the time good men will die. We can't do much about that unfortunately.
I guess you're right. I still feel like shit though.
Do you know what's up with Rashiv?
I don't. He's been sitting there like that since morning.
I guess he's lost something.
Or somebody...
Comrades, get up! New orders! We're going to Le Moule!
ALRIGHT, DISEMBARK. MEDICS SEE TO THE WOUNDED. SQUAD ANTON FOLLOW ME, WE WILL WATCH HORIZON UNTIL OTHERS ARE READY TO RETREAT.

BAZA TO ANTON, INTEL REPORTS A LOT OF INFANTRY HEADING FROM LE MOULE TOWARDS YOUR POSITIONS. PREPARE TO ENGAGE AND REPEL THE ENEMY OR AT THE VERY LEAST DELAY THEM SO THAT OUR UNITS CAN SAFELY REACH THE FARM.
YOU HEARD HIM BOYS, WHOEVER HAS NO BUSINESS HERE, GET YOUR ASS TO FARM, OTHERS FOLLOW ME!
YURI TO BAZA, WE REQUEST TO REMAIN HERE WITH GROUP ANTON UNTIL YOU SOUND FOR RETREAT. OVER.
BAZA TO YURI, YOU ARE ALLOWED TO STAY. DO NOT TAKE UNNECESSARY RISKS AND ONCE THE SITUATION IS CRITICAL, RETREAT. BAZA OUT.
FUCKING HELL, THE TANKS ARE OUT!
ANTON TO BAZA, WE REPELLED THE ENEMY ATTACK. HOW DOES IT LOOK WITH THE RETREATING UNITS, OVER.
BAZA TO ANTON, THEY ARE SAFELY ARRIVING ON THE FARM. YOU SHOULD ALSO RETREAT. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED ANTON. GET BACK BEFORE THE REST OF ENEMY FORCES ARRIVES. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO YURI, WE NEED YOU IN MORTON. REGROUP IMMEDIATELY. BAZA OUT.
YURI TO BAZA, WE ARE ON OUR WAY. STAY STRONG, ANTON. OUT.
